name: Cisco | IOS | Network | LBD | Loop Detected (SYSLOG)
description: %PM-4-ERR_DISABLE: loopback error detected on Gi4/1, putting Gi4/1 in err-disable state

patterns.value_re: %PM(-SP)?-4-ERR_DISABLE: loopback error detected on (?P<interface>\S+), putting \S+ in err-disable state

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | LBD | Loop Cleared (SYSLOG)
description: %PM-4-ERR_RECOVER: Attempting to recover from loopback err-disable state on Fa0/24

patterns.value_re: %PM(-SP)?-4-ERR_RECOVER: Attempting to recover from loopback err-disable state on (?P<interface>\S+)
